mapper.select: select * from admin_menu_group where id in ( select DISTINCT(menu_group_id) from admin_menu func, ( select menu_id from admin_account_menu where admin_account_id = #{accountId} and stat=1 union select menu_id from admin_role_menu where role_id = #{roleId} and stat=1 and stat=1 ) mapping where func.id = mapping.menu_id and func.stat=1 ) and stat=1 order by menu_group_order ASC
